医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
SECRE技术为自身免疫性疾病的新疗法铺平了道路科学家们开发出了一种潜在的变革性新技术，可以帮助发现和开发一些全球流行的自身免疫性疾病的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/SECRE-technique-paves-way-for-new-therapeutics-for-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/SECRE-technique-paves-way-for-new-therapeutics-for-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ef61ec6-77ab-41fa-b6f7-e086f553db82 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 14:24:11 -0500 SECRE technique paves way for new therapeutics for autoimmune diseases
2020 年美国枪伤造成的经济负担将达到 4930 亿美元根据爱思唯尔出版的《美国预防医学杂志》报道的新研究，2020 年美国致命和非致命枪伤造成的经济影响比 2019 年增加了 16%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Economic-burden-of-firearm-injuries-in-the-US-reaches-24493-billion-in-2020.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Economic-burden-of-firearm-injuries-in-the-US-reaches-24493-billion-in-2020.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dddd69ac-abd2-42e5-9886-1ef99e33bcd6 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 14:14:51 -0500 Economic burden of firearm injuries in the US reaches $493 billion in 2020
研究发现饮酒可能对心脏病风险产生反作用一项新研究发现了 60 种与酒精相关的循环代谢物，这些代谢物似乎对心脏病风险产生反作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Alcohol-conspiration-may-have-counteractive-effects-on-heart-disease-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Alcohol-conspiration-may-have-counteractive-effects-on-heart-disease-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=587cb001-343c-42ff-b2e8-9b64f52725ce Mon, 27 Nov 2023 13:58:46 -0500 Alcohol consumption may have counteractive effects on heart disease risk, study finds
跨男性个体的激素疗法可能比以前想象的更安全对于跨男性人群的性别确认激素治疗，一个常见的担忧是使用处方睾酮时红细胞体积变化和红细胞增多（红细胞浓度高）的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Hormone-therapy-for-transmasculine-individuals-may-be-safer-than-previously-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Hormone-therapy-for-transmasculine-individuals-may-be-safer-than-previously-thought.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa2a1f4a-1247-481c-8e7a-a585bec605f7 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 13:47:18 -0500 Hormone therapy for transmasculine individuals may be safer than previously thought
大脑炎症与阿尔茨海默氏症的神经精神症状有关匹兹堡大学医学院的研究人员今天在 JAMA Network Open 上报告称，医生在阿尔茨海默病患者身上看到的常见神经精神症状源于大脑炎症，而不是淀粉样蛋白和 tau 蛋白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Brain-inflammation-linked-to-neuropsychiatric-symptoms-in-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Brain-inflammation-linked-to-neuropsychiatric-symptoms-in-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d37aff97-b332-4455-a67a-47f4202cd597 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 13:41:17 -0500 Brain inflammation linked to neuropsychiatric symptoms in Alzheimer's
新的 CRISPR 方法显示出治疗胶质母细胞瘤的希望格莱斯顿研究所的一项新研究结果显示，基因编辑技术 CRISPR 作为治疗侵袭性且难以治疗的脑癌（即原发性胶质母细胞瘤）的治疗策略显示出早期前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-CRISPR-approach-shows-promise-for-treating-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-CRISPR-approach-shows-promise-for-treating-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4a9bf96-328a-4239-89ec-799e1ac0cba6 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 13:30:28 -0500 New CRISPR approach shows promise for treating glioblastoma
Mass General Brigham 与 A​​nnalise.ai 合作开发人工智能诊断产品Mass General Brigham 和 Annalise.ai 今天宣布合作，将双方互补的专业知识、能力和技术结合起来，构建和实施人工智能诊断产品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Mass-General-Brigham-partners-with-Annaliseai-to-develop-AI-enabled-diagnostic-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Mass-General-Brigham-partners-with-Annaliseai-to-develop-AI-enabled-diagnostic-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5280dd26-05b4-481d-a847-42c78a13a342 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 13:20:42 -0500 Mass General Brigham partners with Annalise.ai to develop AI-enabled diagnostic products
个性化的健康和生活方式改变可以延缓老年人的记忆丧失研究表明，当参与者保持活跃和社交参与、控制血压和糖尿病时，认知能力会得到改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Personalized-health-and-lifestyle-changes-can-delay-memory-loss-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Personalized-health-and-lifestyle-changes-can-delay-memory-loss-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2ff9d90-247c-4687-a25d-0c678a40d9cc Mon, 27 Nov 2023 13:13:30 -0500 Personalized health and lifestyle changes can delay memory loss in older adults
研究人员朝着开发多发性硬化症的细胞疗法迈出了一步一个国际团队表明，将一种干细胞注射到进行性多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者的大脑中是安全的、耐受性良好的，并且具有持久的效果，似乎可以保护大脑免受进一步损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Researchers-take-step-toward-developing-cell-therapy-treatment-for-MS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Researchers-take-step-toward-developing-cell-therapy-treatment-for-MS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32cf4e11-c8a7-44a5-bf23-eb7b85e6bfe2 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 12:59:55 -0500 Researchers take step toward developing cell therapy treatment for MS
婴儿面部偏好与遗传有关五个月大的婴儿是否主要看脸或汽车或手机等非社交物体，很大程度上取决于基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Infant-face-preference-linked-to-genics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Infant-face-preference-linked-to-genics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=285931e1-0f02-4a47-b90b-ce025997b1cd Mon, 27 Nov 2023 12:40:45 -0500 Infant face preference linked to genetics
